150.last_action: Bill text as passed House and Senate (HJ7001ER)
150.title: Rules, Joint Committee on, and the Speaker of the House of Delegates; confirming appointments.
150.description: Confirming appointments by the Joint Committee on Rules and the Speaker of the House of Delegates. Confirms various appointments by the Joint Committee on Rules to the Virginia State Council for Interstate Adult Offender Supervision, the Virginia Council for the Interstate Compact for Juveniles, the Board of Trustees of the Virginia Retirement System, and the Commonwealth Health Research Board and an appointment by the Speaker of the House of Delegates to the Virginia Conflict of Interest and Ethics Advisory Council.

151.last_action: Bill text as passed House and Senate (HJ7002ER)
151.title: Legislative Services, Director of the Division of; confirming appointment.
151.description: Confirming appointment of the Director of the Division of Legislative Services. Confirms the appointment made by the Committees on Rules of the House of Delegates and the Senate of Amigo R. Wade as the Director of the Division of Legislative Services.

152.title: General Assembly; limiting legislation to be considered during the 2021 Special Session II, etc.
152.description: Limiting legislation to be Limiting legislation to be considered by the 2021 Special Session II of the General Assembly and establishing a schedule for the conduct of business coming before such Special Session.

153.last_action: Bill text as passed House and Senate (HJ7004ER)
153.title: Judges; election in Court of Appeals of Virginia, circuit court, general district court, etc.
153.description: Election of Court of Appeals of Virginia Judges, Circuit Court Election of Court of Appeals of Virginia Judges, Circuit Court judges, General District Court judges, a Juvenile and Domestic Relations Court judge, and members of the Judicial Inquiry and Review Commission.

155.last_action: Referred to Committee on Finance and Appropriations
155.title: Virginia Overtime Wage Act; repeals the Act.
155.description: Virginia Overtime Wage Act; repealed. Repeals the Virginia Overtime Wage Act, which governs the provision of overtime compensation to certain employees in Virginia. Under the bill, the provision of overtime compensation would be governed solely by the federal Fair Labor Standards Act.
